# init()

**Initializer**

Creates an audio engine instance for rendering in real time.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Return Value

A new `AVAudioEngine` instance.

## Discussion

To operate in manual rendering mode, which removes real-time running constraints, see [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioEngine/enableManualRenderingMode(_:format:maximumFrameCount:)].
title: init()
